channel.title: Need help with server please
channel.description: Hi. I yesterday created my first own private server. I used tutorial on moparscape. I am using testscape for server. But i have lots of bugs ... and i need your help please .. i try write all the bugs i have 1. I cant use magic. When i want cast something it says i dont have runes for this spell but i have 2. When i open doors to member area they open but i cant get to member area. 3. I cant folow. In menu is only trade, stats and walk here. 4. How i set on my character all level on 99 ? How i add to the bank of my character some item ? Or to inventory ? Please help me with this "bugs" :( .. do you know better server than is testscape FREE ? Please use simple English i am from Slovakia.

item.title: Need help with server please
item.dc:creator: @Djbaca Djbaca
item.description:
@Djbaca wrote:

Sorry i dont understand … Gate co-ords are (2882) (3268,3227) … It is gate to Al kharid. Can you make code exactly for this gate ? when u make it i hope i will understand better. And where i have to write the code ?[br][size=1]Posted on: June 17, 2007, 06:14:48 AM[/size][hr]Hi … i downloaded Perfect scape … i do something what are written in tutorial … i compiled it … it says
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
Press any key to continue . . .

When i want start server it says
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "1
160 "
at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException.
java:48)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:456)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:497)
at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1343)
at NPCHandler.(NPCHandler.java:23)
at server.main(server.java:28)

can you please help me ? i cant connect to server … for faster comunication you can write on icq 250307284 … or here

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with server please
item.dc:creator: @Ministry Ministry
item.description:
@Ministry wrote:

Search for a case, and make a case what should look like this.

case 000 teletoy = 0000 teletox = 0000 break

Thats just an example dont use it because you will get errors but you put the co-ords what you want so it teleports you the’re. Hope that helped

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with server please

item.description:
@javis wrote:

the reason you cant open members thing is because they havnt been programed in yet basically all you have to do is program them in and it will work

item.title: Need help with server please
item.dc:creator: @Djbaca Djbaca
item.description:
@Djbaca wrote:

Hi. Thank you. I try all servers what u writed but in all are bugs. I never cant open gates or doors to member area. I cant open gate to Al kharid too. Any1 know how fix this bug ? I dont found on LaxiScape other bugs, but i want fix this. Please help me

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with server please
item.dc:creator: @Ministry Ministry
item.description:
@Ministry wrote:

Dont use TestScape if its your first server go for something simple like laxiscape, PimpScape PhoneScape because TestScape has tons of bugs,Glitches wich can get extremely enoying for a first time server maker, I no people say TestScape is for first time server makers but In my opinoin it isnt so I Hope this Helped.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with server please
item.dc:creator: @Djbaca Djbaca
item.description:
@Djbaca wrote:

Hi. I yesterday created my first own private server. I used tutorial on moparscape. I am using testscape for server. But i have lots of bugs … and i need your help please … i try write all the bugs i have

  1. I cant use magic. When i want cast something it says i dont have runes for this spell but i have
  2. When i open doors to member area they open but i cant get to member area.
  3. I cant folow. In menu is only trade, stats and walk here.
  4. How i set on my character all level on 99 ? How i add to the bank of my character some item ? Or to inventory ?
    Please help me with this “bugs” … do you know better server than is testscape FREE ?
    Please use simple English i am from Slovakia.
